headline.main: PRESIDENT SHAPES DEFENSE MINISTRY; Capital Thinks Hull, Stimson, Morgenthau and Knox Have Been Chosen for Task 'FRONT OFFICE' FOR OPM Latter Would Be 'Work Shop' for Producing and Procuring the Flow of Materials

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 28 -- Quietly and within his official family President Roosevelt has been setting up machinery for cooperative rearmament efforts of the United States and Great Britain to follow enactment of the lease-lend bill.
abstract: Defense Ministry intra-Cabinet group mapped by Roosevelt for action following lend-lease bill passage; Hull, Morgenthau, Stimson and Knox included; OPM status discussed
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 28 -- Quietly and within his official family President Roosevelt has been setting up machinery for cooperative rearmament efforts of the United States and Great Britain to follow enactment of the lease-lend bill....

byline.original: By TURNER CATLEDGESpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
